label: Task-1
title: Implement POST /transfers endpoint
description: Accepts token + file_size + content_type_hint. Validates token. Creates meta.json in S3. Generates pre-signed PUT URL (1hr expiry). Returns transfer_id + upload_url.

properties.acceptance_criteria: Valid token returns 201 with transfer_id + pre-signed URL. Invalid token returns 401. Pre-signed URL works for PUT to S3.
